divs: sighting detailsin my car, back road, near my home. saw bright white light, like a very large star\planet, descend in distance. no trail, no sound, no blinking or wavering. larger than jupiter in the sky, bright white. closest known similar object is a missile at night. i do not know if it went past the horizon or if it landed, no explosion, did not slow before ground\horizon. very fast. faster than plane, helicopter, etc., slower than meteorite. got out, walked up and down the road to see if it was a reflection, not a reflection on any object. was very spooked. i live in an area where we get a lot of military aircraft, and have seen many, but this was nothing like any of them i have seen.
Summary: Bright White Light descended quickly straight down.
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Hagerstown
There were no other sightings in Hagerstown on or around November 4th 2011
